1.0.0.name: wordpress/plugin-tinyslideshow
1.0.0.description:
This plugin is a JavaScript slide show is full of features. Features include smooth animation, title / description / link support, no naming restrictions, graceful degradation, on demand loading of image and status of assets.

This plugin implements the JavaScript slideshow is from Mechael Leibeger.
